mapper.select: SELECT g.id id ,g.name name ,g.price price,g.now_price now_price, i.Thumb_path thumb_path,i.show_path show_path, d.weight weight ,d.unit unit ,t.strategy_name strategy_name ,t.parameter1 parameter1 FROM goods g LEFT JOIN goods_detail d ON g.id=d.gid LEFT JOIN goods_strategy s ON g.id=s.gid LEFT JOIN strategy t ON s.sid=t.id LEFT JOIN goods_img i ON g.id=i.gid WHERE g.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{goodsname}), '%') and g.state=1
SELECT id brand_id ,NAME brand_name FROM goods_brand
SELECT id type_id ,NAME type_name FROM goods_type
